citations.narrative:
The rabbit food storage cannister contained dust-like white, sporous material in back corners, contacting the food pellets
and active larvae were also seen. Contaminated food can lead to decreased diet quality which may cause disease or
illness in the animals being fed. Food must free from contamination, wholesome, palatable and of sufficient quantity and
nutritive value. Correct by 21 March 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.54(a) 
   
Feeding. 
The rabbit food storage cannister contained dust-like white, sporous material in back corners, contacting the food pellets 
and active larvae were also seen. Contaminated food can lead to decreased diet quality which may cause disease or 
illness in the animals being fed. Food must free from contamination, wholesome, palatable and of sufficient quantity and 
nutritive value. Correct by 21 March 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
